#summary A list of Event Painter Implementations

= Event Painter Implementations =

Event Painter classes provided by default: 
 # [Timeline_OriginalPainterClass Timeline.Original-PainterClass]
 # [Timeline_OriginalPainterClass Timeline.Overview-PainterClass]

They all expose the [Timeline_EventPainterClass event painter interface], but they differ in their initialization parameters.
